participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emily enjoys expressing her love for Disney through her nursery decor and singing, even if her asthma limits her. She's close with her family and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery. I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore. I am pretty close with my family. I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work. I speak fluent Italian.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and family-oriented, Jordan enjoys showcasing his lifestyle and maintaining his fitness. He values character over appearance and has a nostalgic love for 80s music.
participant_2.background: I would brag about my super cool beach house. I work out whenever I can to stay in shape and have the energy I need to take care of my family. I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality. I love 80s music. I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.

content.text: Hi! I really like The Princess Bride. It's just so fun and charming.
Oh, that's a good one! I love the sword fights and the acting.
Me too! It's such a classic.
I'm kind of a Disney fan, so I like a lot of the older movies.
Me too! I love the Disney movies from the 80s and 90s.
My favorite Disney movie is probably The Little Mermaid.
That's a good choice! I love that movie too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to work out, go to the beach, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go out to eat, shop, and spend time with my friends.
We should get together sometime and watch a movie!
That sounds like a great idea! I'll have to check my schedule and let you know.
